allowVideoConferencing.title: Allow FaceTime
allowVideoConferencing.description: If Allow use of Camera is set to 'false', this will override this preference if set to 'true'.

allowAutoUnlock.title: Allow Apple Watch to auto unlock device

allowFingerprintForUnlock.title: Allow Touch ID / Face ID to unlock device

allowYouTube.title: Allow Apple's YouTube
allowYouTube.description: This key is ignored on iOS 6 and later because the YouTube app is no longer built in.

allowDeprecatedWebKitTLS.title: Allow accessing websites using TLS 1.0 and 1.1
allowDeprecatedWebKitTLS.description: Allow websites that use TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1 to be accessed using Safari.

allowAirPrintiBeaconDiscovery.title: Allow discovery of AirPrint printers using iBeacons
allowAirPrintiBeaconDiscovery.description: If Allow AirPrint is set to 'false', it also overrides this preference.

forceAirPrintTrustedTLSRequirement.title: Disallow AirPrint to destinations with untrusted certificates
forceAirPrintTrustedTLSRequirement.description: If Allow AirPrint is set to 'false', it also overrides this preference.

allowScreenShot.title: Allow screenshots and screen recording
allowScreenShot.description: Updated in iOS 9.0 to include screen recordings.

allowRemoteScreenObservation.title: Allow AirPlay and View Screen by Classroom app
allowRemoteScreenObservation.description: If Allow screenshots and screen recording is set to 'false', it also overrides this preference and prevents the Classroom app from observing remote screens.

forceClassroomUnpromptedScreenObservatio.title: Allow Classroom app to perform AirPlay and View Screen without prompting
forceClassroomUnpromptedScreenObservatio.description:
If Allow screenshots and screen recording is set to 'false' or Allow AirPlay and View Screen by Classroom app, they also override this preference and prevents the Classroom app from unprompted remote AirPlay and view screens.

Additionally, if set to true and ScreenObservationPermissionModificationAllowed is also true in the Education payload, a student enrolled in a managed course via the Classroom app will automatically give permission to that course's teacher's requests to observe the student's screen without prompting the student.

forceUnpromptedManagedClassroomScreenObs.description: Deprecated in iOS 11. Use forceClassroomUnpromptedScreenObservation instead.

allowVoiceDialing.title: Allow voice dialing while the device is locked

allowAssistantWhileLocked.title: Allow Siri when device is locked
allowAssistantWhileLocked.description: If Allow Siri is set to 'false', it also overrides this preference. This preference is ignored if the device does not have a passcode set.

forceAssistantProfanityFilter.title: Enable Siri profanity filter
forceAssistantProfanityFilter.description: If Allow Siri is set to 'false', it also overrides this preference. This preference is ignored if the device does not have a passcode set.

allowAssistantUserGeneratedContent.title: Show user-generated content in Siri
allowAssistantUserGeneratedContent.description: If Allow Siri is set to 'false', it also overrides this preference. This preference is ignored if the device does not have a passcode set.

allowSiriServerLogging.title: Allow server-side logging of Siri commands
allowSiriServerLogging.description: Allow server-side logging of Siri commands

allowUIAppInstallation.title: Allow installing apps using App Store
allowUIAppInstallation.description: If Allow installing apps is set to 'false', this will override this preference.

allowAutomaticAppDownloads.title: Allow automatic app downloads
allowAutomaticAppDownloads.description: If Allow installing apps is set to 'false', this will override this preference.

forceITunesStorePasswordEntry.title: Require iTunes Store password for all purchases

allowManagedAppsCloudSync.title: Allow managed apps to store data in iCloud

allowEnterpriseBookMetadataSync.title: Allow notes and highlights sync for enterprise books

allowCloudPrivateRelay.title: Allow iCloud Private Relay
allowCloudPrivateRelay.description: If set to false, prevents the use of iCloud Private Relay.

allowEraseContentAndSettings.title: Allow Erase All Content and Settings

allowUntrustedTLSPrompt.title: Allow users to accept untrusted TLS certificates

allowEnterpriseAppTrust.title: Allow trusting new enterprise app authors

allowOTAPKIUpdates.title: Allow automatic updates to certificate trust settings

allowUIConfigurationProfileInstallation.title: Allow user installation of configuration profiles

forceClassroomUnpromptedAppAndDeviceLock.title: Allow Classroom to lock apps or the device without prompting

forceClassroomAutomaticallyJoinClasses.title: Automatically join Classroom classes without prompting

forceClassroomRequestPermissionToLeaveCl.title: Require teacher permission to leave Classroom app unmanaged classes

allowAppCellularDataModification.title: Allow modifying celluar data app settings

allowFindMyFriendsModification.title: Allow modifying Find My Friends settings

allowNFC.title: Allow NFC
allowNFC.description: If set to false, disables Near-field Communication functionality.

allowFingerprintModification.title: Allow modifying Touch ID / Face ID
allowFingerprintModification.description: If Allow modifying passcode is set to 'false', this will override this preference if set to 'true'.

allowEnablingRestrictions.title: Allow Screen Time
allowEnablingRestrictions.description: If set to 'false', disables the "Enable ScreenTime" option in the ScreenTime UI in Settings and disables ScreenTime if already enabled.

allowUSBRestrictedMode.title: Allow USB accessories while device is locked

allowUnpairedExternalBootToRecovery.title: Allow booting into recovery by unpaired devices

allowOpenFromManagedToUnmanaged.title: Allow documents from managed sources in unmanaged destinations

allowOpenFromUnmanagedToManaged.title: Allow documents from unmanaged sources in managed destinations

allowUnmanagedToReadManagedContacts.title: Allow unmanaged apps to read contacts from managed contacts accounts
allowUnmanagedToReadManagedContacts.description: Allow unmanaged apps to read contacts from managed contacts accounts

allowManagedToWriteUnmanagedContacts.title: Allow managed apps to write contacts to unmanaged contacts accounts
allowManagedToWriteUnmanagedContacts.description: Allow managed apps to write contacts to unmanaged contacts accounts

requireManagedPasteboard.title: Require managed pasteboard
requireManagedPasteboard.description: When set to true, pasteboard functionality between managed and unmanaged apps mirrors that set for opening documents.

allowDiagnosticSubmission.title: Allow submitting diagnostic and usage data to Apple

allowDiagnosticSubmissionModification.title: Allow modifying diagnostic settings
allowDiagnosticSubmissionModification.description: If Allow diagnostic and usage data to Apple is set to 'false', this will override this preference if set to 'true'.

forceAuthenticationBeforeAutoFill.title: Require Touch ID / Face ID authentication before Autofill

forceWiFiPowerOn.title: Force Wi-Fi Power On
forceWiFiPowerOn.description: Prevents turning Wi-Fi off in Settings, Control Center, or by entering Airplane Mode.

forceWiFiToAllowedNetworksOnly.title: Join only Wi-Fi networks installed by a Wi-Fi payload

forceWiFiWhitelisting.title: Join only Wi-Fi networks installed by a Wi-Fi payload

allowProximitySetupToNewDevice.title: Allow setting up new nearby iOS devices

allowSharedDeviceTemporarySession.title: Allow Shared iPad temporary session
allowSharedDeviceTemporarySession.description: Enable temporary sessions for iPads that have been enabled as Shared iPad.

allowPassbookWhileLocked.title: Allow Apple Wallet notifications on Lock screen

allowLockScreenControlCenter.title: Show Control Center on Lock screen

allowLockScreenNotificationsView.title: Show Notification Center on Lock screen

allowLockScreenTodayView.title: Show Today view on Lock screen

forceAirPlayOutgoingRequestsPairingPassw.title: Require passcode on first AirPlay pairing

allowAirPrintCredentialsStorage.title: Allow storage of AirPrint credentials in Keychain
allowAirPrintCredentialsStorage.description: If Allow AirPrint is set to 'false', it also overrides this preference.

allowAddingGameCenterFriends.title: Allow adding Game Center friends
allowAddingGameCenterFriends.description: If Allow use of Game Center is set to 'false', this will override this preference.

allowMultiplayerGaming.title: Allow multiplayer gaming
allowMultiplayerGaming.description: If Allow use of Game Center is set to 'false', this will override this preference.

safariAllowAutoFill.title: Enable AutoFill
safariAllowAutoFill.description: If Allow use of Safari is set to 'false', this will override this preference.

safariForceFraudWarning.title: Force fraud warning
safariForceFraudWarning.description: If Allow use of Safari is set to 'false', this will override this preference.

safariAllowJavaScript.title: Enable JavaScript
safariAllowJavaScript.description: If Allow use of Safari is set to 'false', this will override this preference.

safariAllowPopups.title: Block popups
safariAllowPopups.description: If Allow use of Safari is set to 'false', this will override this preference.

safariAcceptCookies.title: Accept cookies
safariAcceptCookies.description: If Allow use of Safari is set to 'false', this will override this preference.

enum_titles: Never / Prevent Cross-Site Tracking & Block All Cookies (User Restricted)
Allow from current website only / Prevent Cross-Site Tracking (User Restricted)

blockedAppBundleIDs.title: Blocked Apps
blockedAppBundleIDs.description: When populated, prevents displaying or launching listed apps. Use bundle ID com.apple.webapp to block all webclips. Disabled when using the Allowed Apps preference.

blacklistedAppBundleIDs.title: Restrict App Usage - Denylist
blacklistedAppBundleIDs.description: If enabled, cannot use the allowlist to restrict app usage.

allowListedAppBundleIDs.title: Allowed Apps
allowListedAppBundleIDs.description: When populated, prevents displaying or launching apps other than the listed ones. Use bundle ID com.apple.webapp to allow all webclips. Disabled when using the Blocked Apps preference.

whitelistedAppBundleIDs.title: Restrict App Usage - Allowlist
whitelistedAppBundleIDs.description: If enabled, cannot use the denylist to restrict app usage.

ratingApps.title: Allowed content ratings - Apps
ratingApps.description: Integer rating value based on region. Not all integer values are used in each region. Apple's Configuration Profile documentation includes the values for the US, so you may need to do some sleuthing here.

ratingMovies.title: Allowed content ratings - Movies
ratingMovies.description: Integer rating value based on region. Not all integer values are used in each region. Apple's Configuration Profile documentation includes the values for the US, so you may need to do some sleuthing here.

ratingTVShows.title: Allowed content ratings - TV Shows
ratingTVShows.description: Integer rating value based on region. Not all integer values are used in each region. Apple's Configuration Profile documentation includes the values for the US, so you may need to do some sleuthing here.

allowExplicitContent.title: Allow playback of explicit music, podcasts, and iTunes U

allowFilesUSBDriveAccess.title: Allow Files USB Drive Access
allowFilesUSBDriveAccess.description: Allow connecting to and browsing any USB storage device in the Files App

allowBookstoreErotica.title: Allow explicit sexual content in iBooks Store

allowPasswordProximityRequests.title: Allow proximity based password sharing requests

enforcedSoftwareUpdateDelay.title: Deferred Software Updates Delay
enforcedSoftwareUpdateDelay.description: Number of days the software updates will be hidden from the user.

allowFindMyDevice.title: Allow Find My Devices
allowFindMyDevice.description: Allows disabling Find My Device in the Find My app

allowFindMyFriends.title: Allow Find My Friends
allowFindMyFriends.description: Allows disabling Find My Friends in the Find My app

allowFilesNetworkDriveAccess.title: Allow Files Network Drive Access
allowFilesNetworkDriveAccess.description: Allows preventing connection to network drives in the Files app

enforcedFingerprintTimeout.title: Enforced Fingerprint Timeout
enforcedFingerprintTimeout.description: Period of time in seconds after which the device will require entry of password or passcode to unlock. The default value is 172800 seconds, which are 48 hours.
